text:
"The Java Authentication Service Provider Interface for Containers (JASPIC) specification defines a service provider interface (SPI) by which authentication providers that implement message authentication mechanisms may be integrated in client or server message processing containers or runtimes."

Providing JASPIC support within Tomcat will reduce the amount of work required to provide authentication for multiple authentication mechanisms and provide better consistency and portability across different Tomcat-based projects.

Currently JASPIC has support within Geronimo and utilising this seems like the quickest way forward to providing support within Tomcat itself.

I am interested in contributing code for this feature based on some existing work already done in this area. I am also emailing the developers' list.
